column5: I have limited experience in trolling so I don't have a personal favourite. This year I'm planning to do it more often, now to give me a few ideas on what to start off with ... What is your favourite lure for trolling? I'm not looking at any specific specie here ... list'em all if you can and if it's not your secret weapon
Muskie-10" Jake, Pickerel or Orange Tiger!
Bass - Orange Jointed Rapala Pike - Orange Jointed Rapala  Every other species caught when trolling with an Orange jointed rapala
victor, make sure you get some good quality rod holders either the saltys or scotty powerlocks i'd say
Most of my fishing is for lake trout.  My two (I have two favourites): williams c60 spoon in gold/silver hammered pattern and silver/black yozuri minnow bait,
favorite bait is a woodie bait. for musky thre my ticket. 9 dollar bass
Going over weedtops, rapala jointed...firetiger  Going deep, shad or deep diving x-rap. black and silver or perch.
im lovin those matzuous or however you spell them. the wallys also love them
